title: block title
description: block responsible for performing the GraphQL query that fetches the list of products

category.description: Category ID of the Shelf listed items. For sub-categories, use / before the ID to indicate which category it belongs to. For example: '1/2', considering 2 as a sub-category ID)

specificationFilters.description: Specification Filters of the Shelf listed items.

collection.description: Collection ID of the Shelf listed items.

orderBy.description: Ordination criterion for the Shelf listed items. Possible values: OrderByTopSaleDESC, OrderByReleaseDateDESC, OrderByBestDiscountDESC, OrderByPriceDESC, OrderByPriceASC, OrderByNameASC, OrderByNameDESC

hideUnavailableItems.description: Whether unavailable items should be hidden (true) or not (false)

maxItems.description: Maximum items fetched in the context to be displayed on the Shelf.
